snippet.title: Cross-Platform Multiplayer This Summer | My Time at Sandrock
snippet.description:
During the special III-Initiative event, we're thrilled to announce that Sandrock will embrace cross-platform multiplayer this summer!

This means you can enjoy multiplayer fun with your family, friends, or even new acquaintances across different platforms. Whether you're on Steam, Playstation, Xbox, or Switch, you'll be able to join the same server and room, collaborating to build Sandrock together!
